segments.text: You have probably noticed that our products ' prices are competitive . Besides . we can provide more superior products than other companies at the same price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It means that if you place a big order , we usually allow 15 % for a trade discount . And our products feel more slip , colorful and faddish than others . You can have a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds good , and how about its quality ? We only look for the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We always sell the best . You can believe us at this point .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! How long dose it take you to deliver if we order 1000 pieces of silk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Within 2 weeks once we receive your orders .
segments.speaker: S2
